name: Carl Hauser
content: Welcome to the Website of Dr. Carl Hauser Home About Advising Publications Research Teaching Contact Info Office: EME 53 Phone 509-335-6470 Email hauser@eecs.wsu.edu Office Hours - Spring 2015 MW 1-2 pm Spring 2015: CptS 580 - Advanced Programming Languages - meets 4:15-5:30 MW Dr. Carl Hauser Associate Professor School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Washington State University P.O Box 642752 Pullman, Washington 99164-2752 Phone: 509 335-6470 Fax: 509 335-3818 (departmental) 253 323-7079 (personal)
